name: Pseudo Racer
description:
Wanna hang out with your mates but don't know what to do? Stuck inside due to restrictions or rain?

Introducing Pseudo Racer a platform game where two players race each other through obstacles to the finish line.

https://twitter.com/i/status/1297496733585268739

Controls

Control Player 1 (Blue) with the WAD keys (E key for special)

Control Player 2 (Green) with the JIL keys (O key for special)
